description: Program to estimate the probability of false positive (noise-only) clusters.

nxyz.title: Grid Size
nxyz.description: Size of 3D grid to use for simulation

ball.title: Ball Mask
ball.description: Mask off points outside a ball at the center of the grid

mask.title: Mask Dataset
mask.description: Use the 0 sub-brick of this dataset as a mask

oksmallmask.title: Allow Small Mask
oksmallmask.description: Allow small masks with less than 128 nonzero voxels

inset.title: Input Datasets
inset.description: Use these dataset(s) as the simulations to threshold and clusterize

fwhm.title: Gaussian Filter Width
fwhm.description: Gaussian filter width in mm (use -fwhmxyz for different values per axis)

acf.title: Autocorrelation Function
acf.description: Parameters a, b, c for the autocorrelation function

nopad.title: No Padding
nopad.description: Turn off padding slices added for edge effects

pthr.title: P-Value Thresholds
pthr.description: List of uncorrected per voxel p-values

athr.title: Alpha Thresholds
athr.description: List of corrected whole volume alpha-values

lots.title: Lots of Values
lots.description: Use a longer list of values for pthr and athr

mega.title: Mega Values
mega.description: Add even more values to the pthr and athr grids

nodec.title: No Decimal
nodec.description: Print the cluster size threshold as an integer

niml.title: NIML Output
niml.description: Output the table in XML/NIML format

both.title: Both Formats
both.description: Output the table in both XML/NIML format and in .1D format

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Specify prefix for the output files

cmd.title: Command File
cmd.description: Write command for putting results into a file's header
